introduction: The following passage is adapted from Innovations in Early Aviation by Sophia Astor (2021).
text: When inventors such as the Wright brothers first achieved powered flight, the public was captivated. Their success sparked new research into aerodynamics, which ______ to modern aircraft technology.
question: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English? Consider how the clause references broader technological advancements that arose from early aviation research.
explanation: Choice B is correct because which refers to new research, a singular collective idea that requires the singular verb contributes. A contribute is plural. C contributing is a participle lacking a main verb. D has been contribute is ungrammatical.
